title: Typefaces on this beautiful book cover
content:
Does anyone know which beautiful typefaces are on the cover of this book? (except for the main "Subliminar" title font!)

[http://www.zahar.com.br/sites/default/files/livros/download/Subliminar.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012034129/http:/www.zahar.com.br/sites/default/files/livros/download/Subliminar.jpg "http://www.zahar.com.br/sites/default/files/livros/download/Subliminar.jpg")
author: Matheus D.

comments.content: Are those TheSans and TheSerif by Lucas de Grot? What a beautiful book cover this is! I love the color palette and the typeface choice!
